titleInfo.title: Vietnam Moratorium - Work for Peace, Oct 15: A Liturgy Service

mods.abstract: The Vietnam Moratorium was a nationwide student protest against the Vietnam War. It was held on October 15, 1969. A special liturgy was conducted in front of the Administration Building with chaplains from Christian Brothers College, Memphis State University, and Siena College officiating.
